server-url.Name: Server Url
server-url.Hint: The URL on which Ethereal Plane Server is running

enabled.Name: Enable Module
enabled.Hint: If this is not checked, the module will not connect to the server

chat-commands-active.Name: Enable Chat Commands
chat-commands-active.Hint: If this is not checked, the module will not run chat commands

send-rolls-to-chat.Name: Send Rolls to Chat
send-rolls-to-chat.Hint: If this is checked, public rolls will be forwarded to stream chat

enable-chat-tab.Name: Chat Tab
enable-chat-tab.Hint: If this is checked, the Chat Tab will be loaded

allow-socket.Name: Allow Sockets
allow-socket.Hint: WARNING! This will allow player clients to send roll messages. This can be exploited to send anything to chat.

strings.youtube-id-hint: Only use this if auto-detection fails
strings.youtube-id-placeholder: Please enter the Video-ID or link of your livestream
strings.disabled: The Module is not enabled. You can configure it, but it won't do anything until you enable it. Some Options are also unavailable
strings.patreon-disconnected: Please connect to a live streaming service above.
